thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com | 2 of 13
thread.title: Kayla Rekiel

author: Kayla Rekiel
title: Kayla Rekiel
text: I love this company. My glasses broke I emailed them and they sent me a new pair. I took them to ame eye glasses place and they fixed them for me. I emailed firmoo right away and told them I had gotten them fixed and didn't need the free pair anymore more and they had already sent them and they said it's a gift to me. I would recommend this company you everyone.
